info.title: Hospital Management System API
info.description: API for managing hospital operations including patients, doctors, registrations, medical records, and reports

get.description: Retrieves all users in the system

put.description: Updates a user's role in the system

get.description: Retrieves all doctor applications with their status

put.description: Approves a doctor application and creates doctor profile

admin_notes.example: Application approved. Welcome to our hospital.

put.description: Rejects a doctor application with admin notes

admin_notes.example: License verification failed. Please resubmit with valid documents.

message.example: Admin notes are required for rejection

delete.description: Deletes a user from the system

get.description: Retrieves a list of all doctors for patients to select from

post.description: Creates a new consultation booking with a specified doctor

422.description: Doctor is not available at this time slot

message.example: Doctor is not available at this time slot

error.example: Doctor is not available at this time slot

get.summary: Get all consultations for authenticated doctor
get.description: Retrieves all consultations assigned to the currently authenticated doctor

post.description: Register a new doctor and return token

email: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Login with email and password and receive authentication token

get.description: Retrieves all medical records created by the authenticated doctor

notes.example: Patient should monitor blood pressure daily

post.description: Creates a new medical record for a patient

notes.example: Patient should monitor blood pressure daily
Patient should monitor blood pressure daily

id_patient: The id patient field is required.

post.description: Register a new patient and return token

email: The email has already been taken.

post.description: Login with email and password and receive authentication token

get.summary: Create a new report for today
get.description: Creates a new daily report for the authenticated doctor
Retrieves all reports generated by the authenticated doctor

tags.name: Consultations
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing consultations between patients and doctors

tags.name: Reports
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing reports generated by doctors
